abstract: Indicates whether the formatter generates the deprecated calendar date type.
overview:
## Discussion

This property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the formatter generates the deprecated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCalendarDate] type, and is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise. You should use [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Calendar] rather than [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCalendarDate].

# generatesCalendarDates

**Instance Property**

Indicates whether the formatter generates the deprecated calendar date type.

## Declaration

```swift
var generatesCalendarDates: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the formatter generates the deprecated [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCalendarDate] type, and is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise. You should use [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Calendar] rather than [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCalendarDate].
title: generatesCalendarDates
